org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph

Class OutputFormatVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.AbstractJobVertex
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.OutputFormatVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OutputFormatVertex
extends AbstractJobVertex
    A task vertex that run an initialization on the master, trying to deserialize an output format and initializing it on master, if necessary.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OutputFormatVertex(String name)
      Creates a new task vertex with the specified name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initializeOnMaster(ClassLoader loader)
      A hook that can be overwritten by sub classes to implement logic that is called by the master when the job starts.
